description:
tutorial: delete
Instead we'll point people at the Tour and beef up code.html.

Fixes issue 3107.

messages.text:
LGTM

can't go wrong with deleting

> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://code.google.com/p/go/
>
>
> Description:
> tutorial: delete
> Instead we'll point people at the Tour and beef up code.html.
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/**5697077/<http://codereview.appspot.com/5697077/>
>
> Affected files:
>  M doc/Makefile
>  M doc/docs.html
>  M doc/effective_go.html
>  M doc/effective_go.tmpl
>  M doc/go_for_cpp_programmers.**html

>  M doc/install-source.html

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=b8e3e5d3622d ***

tutorial: delete
Instead we'll point people at the Tour and beef up code.html.

Fixes issue 3107.

R=golang-dev, bradfitz, r, adg
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5697077

http://codereview.appspot.com/5697077/diff/1/doc/effective_go.tmpl File doc/effective_go.tmpl (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5697077/diff/1/doc/effective_go.tmpl#newcode30 doc/effective_go.tmpl:30: It augments the language specification, Do we want to link to the go-tour google code project or tour.golang.org? The latter might be more immediately useful http://codereview.appspot.com/5697077/diff/1/src/cmd/godoc/main.go File src/cmd/godoc/main.go (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5697077/diff/1/src/cmd/godoc/main.go#newcode10 src/cmd/godoc/main.go:10: // http://godoc/doc/ serve from $GOROOT/doc - spec, mem, tour, etc. the tour isn't served from here. s/tour, //

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, bradfitz@golang.org, r@google.com, adg@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

subject: code review 5697077: tutorial: delete
